text: 2013–14 WBFAL was the second edition of Women Basketball Friendship Adriatic League. Participated six teams from three countries, champion became the team of Budućnost Podgorica. ==Team information== {| border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" style="margin-left:0.5em;background: #F9F9F9; border: 1px #AAA solid;border-collapse: collapse;" !
